title: Apple's Best Days Are Behind It
text: Apple's (NASDAQ: AAPL) latest quarterly report showed what a lot of investors have feared. iPhone, Mac, and iPad sales are all dropping and the only reason the company's revenue isn't falling is services revenue. But how long will that last? In this video, Travis Hoium covers the red flags for Apple stock given how expensive it is today. *Stock prices used were end-of-day prices of Feb. 2, 2024. The video was published on Feb. 5, 2024. Should you invest $1,000 in Apple right now?
